purpose: The email is a call for papers for the PROFES 2025 conference, inviting submissions of high-quality research related to software development processes and their impact on software product quality. It outlines the aims and scope of the conference, the topics of interest for submissions, and provides important details such as the submission deadline and conference dates. The email encourages contributions from software engineering professionals and provides links for further information.

conf_name_candidates.raw: PROFES 2025 – 26th International Conference on Product-Focused Software Process Improvement
conf_name_candidates.evidence: PROFES 2025 – 26th International Conference on Product-Focused Software Process Improvement

evidence_sentences: PROFES 2025 – 26th International Conference on Product-Focused Software Process Improvement

The PROFES 2025 Research Track invites the submission of high-quality full papers presenting original research, empirical studies, industrial experiences, and case reports related to software development processes and their impact on software product quality.
We welcome contributions on (but not limited to) the following topics:
For more details and updates, please visit the PROFES 2025 website:
